imdb.plot outline: Park Jung Min's interested in a lady while he's in japan for schedules, who is much older than him. She is so insecure around him but he tries his best anyway. She's married, and somewhere in her heart she needs Jung Min too as much as he needs her.
imdb.title: Love Song in August
plot: The encounter between a wife who forgets about love and an artist who can't sing the songs of love.::Anonymous

Park Jung Min's interested in a lady while he's in japan for schedules, who is much older than him. She is so insecure around him but he tries his best anyway. She's married, and somewhere in her heart she needs Jung Min too as much as he needs her.::Anonymous
